# epar

<!-- badges: start -->

```{r coverage_badge, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(epar::test_and_badge())
```

<!-- badges: end -->

The `epar` package is for general use R utility functions for US EPA R Users.  Only a few things here now, but more to come.

## Installation

You can install the development version of epar from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("USEPA/epar")
```
